Text:
@liquidpod
You sure, you have computer setup good enough to play hd-rips? Any other comments anyone?

thx for sharing, audio for all 3 movies is in sync!
although the resolutions are not mod16 all 3 play flawlessly in my samsung br-player - same should go for all newer samsung br-players/flatscreens.

RE1
RUNTIME..........: 1:40:31 
SIZE................: 3,92 GB 
VIDEO.CODEC..: x264 High@L4.1
FRAMERATE......: 23.976 
BITRATE...........: 5329 kbps 
RESOLUTION.....: 1280x692 AR 1.85:1
AUDIO..............: AAC 5.1 256 kbit
SUBTITLES........: smi/srt (kor, eng)
CHAPTERS.........: yes
